animals.title: Cats
animals.text: In terms of development, the first year of a cat's life is equal to the first 15 years of a human life. Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees. The hearing of the average cat is at least five times keener than that of a human adult.

animals.title: Elephants
animals.text: Elephants are known for their large ears, tusks made of ivory and their trunks â€“ which are actually a fusion of their nose and upper lip. Elephants are the world's largest land animal! Male African elephants can reach 3m tall and weigh between 4,000 -7,500kg.
